name.ch: 解剖生理與臨床醫學工程

department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程旨在提供生醫背景碩博士學生完整的解剖生理學知識，從細胞層級到器官系統的交互作用，並進一步探討臨床醫學工程的應用。學生將學習細胞與分子生物學的基本概念，深入了解人體主要器官與系統的生理功能，並透過見習台灣醫療科技展覽，將理論與臨床實務結合，了解醫療工程技術的最新進展與應用。
goal.en: This course aims to provide graduate students with a comprehensive understanding of anatomy and physiology, ranging from the cellular level to organ-system interactions. It will also explore applications in clinical medical engineering. Students will learn the fundamentals of cell and molecular biology, delve into the physiological functions of major organs and systems, and integrate theory with practice through clinical visits to Taiwan‘s medical technology exhibitions, gaining insights into the latest developments and applications in medical engineering.

outline.ch:
1. Week 1: Introduction/Organization of the Body/Chemistry of Life
2. Week 2: Extracellular Matrix/ The Integumentary System
3. Week 3: Molecular Laboratory Techniques
4.Week 4: Structure of Eukaryotic Genes
5. Week 5: National Day
6. Week 6: Genome Sequences /Clusters and Repeats
7. Week 7: Cell Cycle Regulation
8. Week 8: DNA Replication/ DNA Repair
9. Week 9: Mid-term Exam (Open Book, one A4 page)
10. Week 10: The Cardiovascular System ＆ Blood (Prof. Ma) R3-112
11. Week 11: School Sports Meet
12. Week 12: Basic Molecular Immunology
13. Week 13: The Skeletal System
(12/04桃園青創日 ＆ 12/06台灣醫療科技展)
14. Week 14: Cytoskeleton/Cell Signal Transduction
15. Week 15: The Muscular System
16. Week 16: Blood
17. Week 17: Final Presentation
outline.en:
1. Week 1: Introduction/Organization of the Body/Chemistry of Life
2. Week 2: Extracellular Matrix/ The Integumentary System
3. Week 3: Molecular Laboratory Techniques
4.Week 4: Structure of Eukaryotic Genes
5. Week 5: National Day
6. Week 6: Genome Sequences /Clusters and Repeats

8. Week 8: DNA Replication/ DNA Repair
9. Week 9: Mid-term Exam (Open Book, one A4 page)
10. Week 10: The Cardiovascular System ＆ Blood (Prof. Ma) R3-112
11. Week 11: School Sports Meet
12. Week 12: Basic Molecular Immunology
13. Week 13: The Skeletal System
(12/04桃園青創日 ＆ 12/06台灣醫療科技展)
14. Week 14: Cytoskeleton/Cell Signal Transduction
15. Week 15: The Muscular System
16. Week 16: Blood
17. Week 17: Final Presentation

textbook.ch:
1. Mader‘s Understanding Human Anatomy and Physiology 9/e (9781259254147): Susannah Nelson Longenbaker
2. Lewin‘s GENES XII (9781284104493): Jocelyn E. Krebs,Elliott S. Goldstein, Stephen T. Kilpatrick
textbook.en:
1. Mader‘s Understanding Human Anatomy and Physiology 9/e (9781259254147): Susannah Nelson Longenbaker
2. Lewin‘s GENES XII (9781284104493): Jocelyn E. Krebs,Elliott S. Goldstein, Stephen T. Kilpatrick

gradMethod.ch:
Class participation    15％
Peer assessment      10％
Mid-term Exam          30％
Final Presentation     30％
Attendance                 15％
gradMethod.en:
Class participation    15％
Peer assessment      10％
Mid-term Exam          30％
Final Presentation     30％
Attendance                 15％

flexDiscription.ch: 除了第1~16週課程外，另以彈性教學方式規劃第17、18週教學活動。
flexDiscription.en: Flexible teaching activities will be applied on 17th and 18th weeks.

ch.competencies: 醫學工程與臨床問題締合

en.competencies: Combination of medical engineering and clinic problems

ch: 系所:限生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班、生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程博士班。
en: Department:Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering、Ph.D. Program of Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering only.
